description.full:
This file is part of
 ZUIX, Javascript library for component-based development.
       https://genielabs.github.io/zuix
description.summary:
This file is part of
 ZUIX, Javascript library for component-based development.
       https://genielabs.github.io/zuix

description.full:
ZxQuery, a very lite subset of jQuery-like functions
internally used in Zuix.

The constructor takes one optional argument that can be
a DOM element, a node list or a valid DOM query selector string expression.
If no parameter is given, the ZxQuery will wrap the root *document* element.
description.summary:
ZxQuery, a very lite subset of jQuery-like functions
internally used in Zuix.
description.body:
The constructor takes one optional argument that can be
a DOM element, a node list or a valid DOM query selector string expression.
If no parameter is given, the ZxQuery will wrap the root *document* element.

code: function ZxQuery(element) {

tags.string: {Number} Number of DOM elements in the current selection.
tags.description: Number of DOM elements in the current selection.

description.full: Number of elements in current DOM selection.
description.summary: Number of elements in current DOM selection.

tags.string: {string} [filter] A valid DOM query selector filter (**default:** *first parent*).
tags.name: [filter]
tags.description: A valid DOM query selector filter (**default:** *first parent*).

tags.string: {ZxQuery} A new *ZxQuery* object with the *parent* selection.
tags.description: A new *ZxQuery* object with the *parent* selection.

description.full: Get the closest parent matching the selector filter.
description.summary: Get the closest parent matching the selector filter.

tags.string: {string} [filter] A valid DOM query selector filter (**default:** *all children*).
tags.name: [filter]
tags.description: A valid DOM query selector filter (**default:** *all children*).

tags.string: {ZxQuery}  A new *ZxQuery* object with the *children* selection.
tags.description: A new *ZxQuery* object with the *children* selection.

description.full: Get the children matching the given selector filter.
description.summary: Get the children matching the given selector filter.

description.full: Reverse the order of elements in current selection.
description.summary: Reverse the order of elements in current selection.

description.full:
Get the DOM element at given position in the current selection.
If no index is provided, the default element will be returned.
description.summary:
Get the DOM element at given position in the current selection.
If no index is provided, the default element will be returned.

description.full:
Get the ZxQuery object for then element at the given
position in the current selection.
description.summary:
Get the ZxQuery object for then element at the given
position in the current selection.

description.full: Select all descendants matching the given *DOM* query selector filter.
description.summary: Select all descendants matching the given *DOM* query selector filter.

tags.string: {ZxQuery~instanceIterationCallback} iterationCallback The callback *fn* to call at each iteration
tags.name: iterationCallback
tags.description: The callback *fn* to call at each iteration

description.full:
Iterate through all *DOM* elements in the selection.
The context object *this*, passed to the
*iterationCallback*`(index, item)`, will be the
*DOM* element corresponding the current iteration.
`index` will be the iteration count, and `item`
the current Element. The context `this` will be a `{ZxQuery}`
instance wrapping the current `item`.

If the callback returns *false*, the iteration loop will interrupt.
description.summary:
Iterate through all *DOM* elements in the selection.
The context object *this*, passed to the
*iterationCallback*`(index, item)`, will be the
*DOM* element corresponding the current iteration.
`index` will be the iteration count, and `item`
the current Element. The context `this` will be a `{ZxQuery}`
instance wrapping the current `item`.
description.body: If the callback returns *false*, the iteration loop will interrupt.

tags.string: {string|ZxQuery} The *attr* attribute value when no *val* specified, otherwise the *ZxQuery* object itself
tags.description: The *attr* attribute value when no *val* specified, otherwise the *ZxQuery* object itself

description.full: Gets or sets the given element attribute.
description.summary: Gets or sets the given element attribute.

tags.description: Path of the event to trigger.

description.full: Trigger a component event.
description.summary: Trigger a component event.

description.summary: Listen once for the given event.

description.full: Listen for the given event.
description.summary: Listen for the given event.

description.full: Stop listening for the given event.
description.summary: Stop listening for the given event.

tags.string: {boolean} *true* if the element is empty, *false* otherwise
tags.description: *true* if the element is empty, *false* otherwise

description.full: Returns *true* if the element is empty.
description.summary: Returns *true* if the element is empty.

description.full: Gets coordinates and visibility status of the element.
description.summary: Gets coordinates and visibility status of the element.

tags.description: The CSS property name or JSON list of properties/values.

tags.description: The *attr* css value when no *val* specified, otherwise the *ZxQuery* object itself

description.summary: Sets or gets the given css property.

description.full: Adds the given css class to the element class list.
description.summary: Adds the given css class to the element class list.

tags.string: {boolean} *true* if the element has the *className* css class, *false* otherwise
tags.description: *true* if the element has the *className* css class, *false* otherwise

description.full: Returns *true* if the element contains the given css class.
description.summary: Returns *true* if the element contains the given css class.

description.full: Removes the given css class to the element class list.
description.summary: Removes the given css class to the element class list.

tags.string: {ZxQuery} A new *ZxQuery* object with the previous sibling element.
tags.description: A new *ZxQuery* object with the previous sibling element.

description.summary: Moves to the previous sibling in the DOM.

tags.string: {ZxQuery} A new *ZxQuery* object with the next sibling element.
tags.description: A new *ZxQuery* object with the next sibling element.

description.full: Moves to the next sibling in the DOM.
description.summary: Moves to the next sibling in the DOM.

description.full: Gets or sets the HTML markup.
description.summary: Gets or sets the HTML markup.

description.full: Appends the given element/markup to the current element.
description.summary: Appends the given element/markup to the current element.

description.full: Prepends the given element/markup to the current element.
description.summary: Prepends the given element/markup to the current element.

tags.string: {string|ZxQuery} The *display* css value when no *mode* specified, otherwise the *ZxQuery* object itself
tags.description: The *display* css value when no *mode* specified, otherwise the *ZxQuery* object itself

description.full: Gets or sets the css `display` property.
description.summary: Gets or sets the css `display` property.

tags.description: The *visibility* css value when no *mode* specified, otherwise the *ZxQuery* object itself

description.full: Gets or sets the css `visibility` property.
description.summary: Gets or sets the css `visibility` property.

description.full: Sets the css `display` property to ''.
description.summary: Sets the css `display` property to ''.

description.full: Sets the css `display` property to 'none'.
description.summary: Sets the css `display` property to 'none'.

description.full: Exported ZxQuery interface.
description.summary: Exported ZxQuery interface.

tags.string: {ZxQuery~iterationCallback} iterationCallback The callback *fn* to call at each iteration
tags.name: iterationCallback
tags.description: The callback *fn* to call at each iteration

description.full:
Iterate through all objects in the given `items` collection.
The context object *this*, passed to the
*iterationCallback*`(index, item)`, will be the
object corresponding the current iteration and
the `index` passed to the callback will be the iteration count.

If the callback returns *false*, the iteration loop will interrupt.
description.summary:
Iterate through all objects in the given `items` collection.
The context object *this*, passed to the
*iterationCallback*`(index, item)`, will be the
object corresponding the current iteration and
the `index` passed to the callback will be the iteration count.
description.body: If the callback returns *false*, the iteration loop will interrupt.

description.full: or $(window).width()
description.summary: or $(window).width()

code: && rect.top < (window.innerHeight || document.documentElement.clientHeight);

description.full: or $(window).height()
